Insert gastric tube.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the necessary equipment for the gastric tube insertion.
Insert gastric tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Insert gastric tube.tools: gastric tube, lubricant, syringe, pH test strip, gloves

Insert gastric tube.sentence: The healthcare provider positions the patient in a semi-upright position to facilitate the procedure.
Insert gastric tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Insert gastric tube.sentence: The healthcare provider measures the appropriate length of the gastric tube to ensure correct placement.
Insert gastric tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Insert gastric tube.object: the appropriate length of the gastric tube

Insert gastric tube.sentence: The healthcare provider gently inserts the gastric tube through the patient's mouth or nose and advances it toward the stomach.
Insert gastric tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Insert gastric tube.sentence: The healthcare provider confirms the correct placement of the gastric tube by checking the pH of aspirated gastric contents.
Insert gastric tube.subject: The healthcare provider
Insert gastric tube.object: the correct placement of the gastric tube
